page.title: 19THE POLICEMAN
page.content: PC Cooper is our Community Beat Police Officer. He has special responsibility for policing an area that covers part of Warley, including our school, and Childerditch. His job is to prevent crime, but if a crime is committed he will try his best to catch the offenders. The types of crime he has to deal with normally are only minor, but at holiday times and Christmas there is a rise in Burglary and Theft, and he is kept quite busy. In the rural area of Childerditch the main problem has been stray dogs worrying and even attacking the farm animals. When the dogs are caught they have to be destroyed. To get around his 'beat' PC Cooper uses a patrol car.
